page.title: 01Uggeshall/Wangford/Stoven
page.content: We live in an unchanging agricultural area bounded by the old Ipswich - Gt Yarmouth Coach Road on the West (A145) and the newer A12 trunk road to Lowestoft on the east. Wangford is the 'big' village with shops, pubs, community centre and garage. But is geographically small. Uggeshall-Stoven-Frostenden are widespead but sparsely populated parishes. While some people still work on the land and in related industries we have many who travel daily to Lowestoft, Southwold and Norwich etc for work and education. The attractive nature of the district hs brought us many people who have retired or are seeking a restful environment. The area is extensively farmed but this is complimented by the valley of the Wang with its fens
